page.title: 01EDUCATION IN THURSTON
page.content:
TIMOTHY'S MORNING.
I am Timothy,aged 8.I get up at half-past 7.I get dressed,then I have my breakfast,usually Rice Crispies. My mummy gets my packed lunch ready, and puts it in my schoolbag.Then we walk to school if it is not raining.If it is we go in the car.When I get there I take my coat off and hang it up with my bag.Then I go to my classroom. My teacher calls the register.Most children have a packed lunch.We work until 10:30 when we have playtime,then come in for more lessons at 10:45.At 12 noon it is dinner-time.The school dinners go in first,then the packed lunch children come in when the dinners go out to play.That is my morning.
